translation: Actions do not taint Me, nor do I have a desire for the fruit of actions. He who knows Me thus is not bound by actions.
commentary: 4.14 Not not? Maam Me? Karmani actions? Limpanti taint? Not not? Me to Me? Karmaphale in the fruit of actions? desire desire? It is thus? Mam Me? who who? recognizes knows? by actions by actions? Not not? He he? bound is bound.Commentary As I have neither egoism nor desire for fruits? I am not bound by actions.
